data.title: MMCM OCP Internship Website
data.body: A website created for Mapúa Malayan Colleges Mindanao to handle the internship operations of the school. All partner companies are listed here, and students can apply for internships and submit requirements.

data.title: MMCM CCIS Website
data.body: A website created for the College of Computer and Information Science Department of Mapúa Malayan Colleges Mindanao.

data.title: MCM Virtual Marketplace 2020
data.body: A website created for Mapúa Malayan Colleges Mindanao's Office for Student Services during the December Virtual Marketing event.

data.title: MCM Virtual Club Fair
data.body: A frontend and backend project for the MCM Virtual Club Fair 2020. The website is used to showcase the institution's student clubs and organization.

data.title: MCM Fusion Technicity: Voting Website
data.body: This Webite is used to assist the MCM Fusion: Technicity event for the academic year 2020-2021 on October 2, 2020. The Website will handle the votation process for the Mr and Ms Staycation, Show Stopper, MCMFlicks and Chill, and Vattle of the Vands. The website also showcases a live display of current votes.
